summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons overtime authorization form for Wanda Leah Smith, a Correctional Systems Officer at FCC Butner, authorizing overtime work on August 10, 2019, due to an institutional emergency. The document is dated August 19, 2019, and appears to be related to staffing during the period following Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Wanda Leah Smith
persons.context: Employee authorized to work overtime at FCC Butner on August 10, 2019, due to an institutional emergency.

events.title: Overtime Work Authorization at FCC Butner
events.description: Wanda Leah Smith was authorized to work overtime from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM due to an institutional emergency at FCC Butner.

keyFacts: The document is an overtime authorization form for a Bureau of Prisons employee dated August 19, 2019.
It authorizes overtime work on August 10, 2019, at FCC Butner due to an 'institutional emergency'.
The timing (August 10, 2019) is significant as it falls shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The document indicates heightened activity or emergency conditions at the prison facility around the time of Epstein's death.
The form follows standard BOP procedures for overtime authorization and payroll documentation.
